output: Print the sum of all odd numbers between X and Y.
input: The first line of input is an integer N that is the number of test cases that follow. Each test case is a line containing two integer X and Y.
name: Sum of Consecutive Odd Numbers II
description: Read an integer N that is the number of test cases. Each test case is a line containing two integer numbers X and Y. Print the sum of all odd values between them, not including X and Y.
